author: Special Correspondent
text:
A large number of school students participated in the essay writing, oratorical, Tirukkural recitation, poetry reciting and painting competitions organised in connection with the observance of Humanity Week.

Prizes distributed

R. Sukumar, District Revenue Officer, was the chief guest at the valediction of the Humanity Week held in the city on Saturday and he gave away prizes to the winners of the competitions.

Speaking on the occasion, Mr. Sukumar said that the Adi Dravida Welfare Department is running 45 primary schools, half-a-dozen middle schools, nine high schools and four higher secondary schools. The department is also running a Model Residential School.

P. T. Sundaram, District Adidravida Welfare Officer, T. S. Kalaiarasan, District Information and Public Relations Officer, and others spoke.
title: Contests held
